data.approach: Investigate Supabase CLI timezone inconsistency between db pull (UTC) and migration new (local time), determine if SQUAD needs to handle display conversion or document the CLI behavior

data.taskTitle: remote schema is from the future
summary: Found root cause: Supabase CLI uses UTC for db pull but local time for migration new
Updated formatVersion() to add (UTC) indicator for remote_schema migrations
Added code comment documenting the timezone inconsistency
reviewFocus: Verify (UTC) label appears correctly for remote_schema migrations
